content:
When I try to validate an example Patient that has their communication.language set, or has an extension with a (valid) Snomed code in it, the public HAPI server gives errors on those codes. For example:

"None of the codings provided are in the value set 'Common Languages' (http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/languages), and a coding is recommended to come from this value set) (codes = urn:ietf:bcp:47#en)"

As far as I can see, the used codes are correct. Is there something broken in HAPI's link to the terminology service?
